newsitem.title: USA: XcelleNet to offer 1.4 mln shrs at $17/shr.
newsitem.headline: XcelleNet to offer 1.4 mln shrs at $17/shr.

text.p: XcelleNet Inc said before the market opening on Wednesday that it was offering 1.433 million shares of its common stock at $17.00 per share.
The news release was issued on PR Newswire at 0826 EST/1326 GMT. XcelleNet shares closed Wednesday down 5/8 at 17.
Of the 1.433 million, 655,953 shares are being sold by the company and 777,047 shares are being sold by selling shareholders, XcelleNet said.

The company said it also granted underwriters an option to purchase up to 214,950 additional shares of common for covering over-allotments, if any. The offering was managed by Robertson, Stephens & Co, Alex. Brown & Sons Inc and Punk, Ziegel & Knoell, L.P.
Earlier, Reuters erroneously reported that ACT Networks, not XcelleNet, had issued a secondary offering of shares below the market.
